thread.title: Aerohive® Senior Director of Global Talent Acquisition Appointed to Forbes Human Resources Council

author: cnbc.com
title: Aerohive® Senior Director of Global Talent Acquisition Appointed to Forbes Human Resources Council

organizations.name: forbes human resources council forbes human resources council

text:
Forbes Human Resources Council is an Invitation-Only Community for HR Executives Across All Industries
MILPITAS, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Aerohive Networks ™ (NYSE: HIVE), a Cloud Networking leader, today announced its Senior Director of Global Talent Acquisition, Marie Norman, has been appointed to the Forbes Human Resources Council, an invitation-only community for HR executives across all industries.
Marie joins other Forbes Human Resources Council members, who are hand-selected to become part of a curated network of successful peers, who gain access to a variety of exclusive benefits and resources, including the opportunity to submit thought-leadership articles and short tips on industry-related topics for publishing on Forbes.com .
Forbes Council combines an innovative, high-touch approach to community management perfected by the team behind the Young Entrepreneur Council (YEC), with the extensive resources and global reach of Forbes. As a result, Forbes Council members get access to the people, benefits and expertise they need to grow their businesses — and a dedicated member concierge who acts as an extension of their own team, providing personalized one-on-one support.
“I am both honored and humbled to join a group of successful, talented, and accomplished HR professionals,” said Marie Norman, senior director of Talent Acquisition, Aerohive Networks. “I look forward to contributing in significant ways to the council and representing Aerohive proudly within this amazing circle and beyond.”
“We are honored to welcome Marie Norman of Aerohive Networks into the community,” said Scott Gerber, founder of Forbes Councils. “Our mission with Forbes Councils is to curate successful professionals from every industry, creating a vetted, social capital-driven network that helps every member make an even greater impact on the business world.”
Marie is a Talent Acquisition Leader with over 20 years of experience leading and building scalable talent-acquisition teams and HR programs in the following industries: cloud networking, management and IT consulting, electronic contract manufacturing services, internet technology, and financial services. Some of the Fortune 500 and small-to-mid-size companies she has worked for include Aerohive Networks, Financial Engines, Solectron, Jabil Circuit, Progressive Insurance, Esurance and Resources Global Professionals.
Over the span of her career, she has led and directed many successful initiatives in the areas of Talent Attraction and Acquisition, Workforce Planning, Career Development and Coaching, Candidate Screening Assessments, Process Development and Re-engineering, Recruiting Systems Implementation, EEO Compliance, Onboarding, University Relations, Employment Branding as well as Diversity, Inclusion & Belonging. Her passion lies in motivating, coaching and building successful TA teams and individuals, cracking the nut to the ever infamous “purple squirrel” searches and employment branded story-telling and development.
About Forbes Councils
Forbes partnered with the founders of Young Entrepreneur Council (YEC) to launch Forbes Councils, invitation-only communities for world-class business professionals in a variety of industries. Members, who are hand-selected by each Council’s community team, receive personalized introductions to each other based on their specific needs and gain access to a wide range of business benefits and services, including best-in-class concierge teams, personalized connections, peer-to-peer learning, a business services marketplace, and the opportunity to share thought leadership content on Forbes.com . For more information about Forbes Human Resources Council, visit https://forbeshrcouncil.com/ . To learn more about Forbes Councils, visit forbescouncils.com .
About Aerohive Networks
Aerohive (NYSE: HIVE) has a proven history of innovation helping IT radically simplify wireless and wired access using Cloud Networking. Aerohive’s Public Cloud, Private Cloud, or Portable Cloud Architecture is based on the latest Cloud technology and offers unrivaled customer choice and flexibility in choosing a deployment option that meets their current and future needs. Aerohive was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Milpitas, CA. For more information, please visit www.aerohive.com , call us at 408-510-6100, follow us on Twitter @Aerohive, subscribe to our blog , or become a fan on our Facebook page .
